name: Planetary Loop (Ticamad)
description:
Create an infinite loop throughout the stars, in 18 different levels with an increasing difficulty curve. Feedback greatly appreciated!

Keep in mind some levels have multiple solutions.

Game is playable on WebGL & downloadable (Win/Mac/Linux). Best performance, quality & stability on downloadable version :) If WebGL is unstable, ensure you have enabled 'Hardware Acceleration' & 'WebGL' in chrome settings.

Hardware Acceleration & WebGL Setup Tutorial (2 min)

Controls:

M1 - Create a loop   |   M2 - Slow Mode   |   F - Toggle FullScreen   |   ESC - Exit to main menu

Changelog (v1.2):

Fixed alternative solutions not registered as an infinite loop.

Added Slowmode (hold RMB to make the energy star move slower).

Improved visualization of what energy star is depleted.

Fixed certain visuals.
